description.zh-cn: 中国文学编审、评论家，中华诗词学会副会长，中国作家协会名誉委员。
description.en: Chinese literary editor and critic, Vice President of the Chinese Poetry Society, and Honorary Member of the China Writers Association.

description.zh-cn: 中国的全国性诗词学术社会团体。
description.en: A national academic social organization for poetry in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党领导的中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization voluntarily formed by writers of all ethnic groups in China under the leadership of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 丁国成是黑龙江肇东人。
description.en: Ding Guocheng is from Zhaodong, Heilongjiang.

description.zh-cn: 丁国成担任中华诗词学会副会长，并曾任第一届、第二届、第三届、第四届理事会成员。他也被列为该学会的顾问。
description.en: Ding Guocheng serves as the Vice President of the Chinese Poetry Society and was a member of its first, second, third, and fourth councils. He is also listed as a consultant for the society.

description.zh-cn: 丁国成是中国作家协会会员，曾任第六届、第七届、第八届、第九届全国委员会委员，后成为名誉委员。
description.en: Ding Guocheng is a member of the China Writers Association. He served as a member of the 6th, 7th, 8th, and 9th National Committees, and later became an Honorary Member.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，丁国成是吉林大学的校友。
description.en: According to category information, Ding Guocheng is an alumnus of Jilin University.

description.zh-cn: 根据分类信息，丁国成是中国共产党党员。
description.en: According to category information, Ding Guocheng is a member of the Communist Party of China.
